project_profile: Clean Konva-based image editor built with React 19 + Vite + Tailwind; single-page app rendering KonvaLayerEditor at src/pages/KonvaLayerEditor.jsx with no navigation.

active_objectives.summary: Repository cleaned to single KonvaLayerEditor implementation; all legacy editors (Fabric, PixiJS, TUI) removed along with their dependencies.

implementation_notes: KonvaLayerEditor (src/pages/KonvaLayerEditor.jsx, 1651 lines) is the sole page component with full editor UI: toolbar with tool dropdowns, canvas sidebar for artboard management, inspector panel for properties, rulers, transform handles, and multi-canvas support.
Dependencies limited to: React 19, react-dom, konva, react-konva, plus dev tooling (Vite, Tailwind, ESLint).
Toolbar supports: select/zoom/crop tools, flip/rotate transforms, draw/shape/text insertion with dropdowns. Filters accessible via standalone button.
Multi-artboard workflow: each Canvas entry in sidebar has independent frame/background; selecting switches the Stage context.
All SVG icons stored in public/icons/<letter>/name.svg with currentColor for theming, rendered via src/components/Icon.jsx cache.
Undo/redo (Cmd+Z/Cmd+Shift+Z), Alt-drag cloning, zoom-at-pointer, Esc to cancel pending inserts.
decision_log: 2025-11-18: Major cleanup - removed all experimental editors (Fabric, PixiJS, TUI, filter demos) and dependencies, keeping only Konva-based implementation.
2025-11-18: Simplified App.jsx to directly render KonvaLayerEditor with no navigation or lazy loading.
2025-11-18: Fixed syntax errors in KonvaLayerEditor (extra closing brace at line 900 causing 'return outside function' error).
2025-11-17: Added docs/llm-context-protocol/protocol.md and llm-rules.md for LLM collaboration workflow.
communication_style: User writes casually, expects concise teammate responses with clear next steps.
